entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
